00021 void CModelCam::ProjectPoints()
00022 {
00023 CvMat* obj;
00024 CvMat* proj;
00025 obj=cvCreateMat(1,6,CV_32FC1);
00026 proj=cvCreateMat(4,2,CV_32FC1);
00027 CvMat * m;
00028 m=cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
00029 for (list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();It != pMap->bbdd.end();It++)
00030 {
00031     cvmSet(obj,0,0,(*It)->wx);
00032     cvmSet(obj,0,1,(*It)->wy);
00033     cvmSet(obj,0,2,(*It)->wz);
00034     cvmSet(obj,0,3,(*It)->theta);
00035     cvmSet(obj,0,4,(*It)->phi);
00036     cvmSet(obj,0,5,(*It)->rho);
00037 
00039    cvProject_1_pto(obj,proj,(*It)->dpdr,(*It)->dpdt,(*It)->dpdw);
00040    (*It)->projx=cvmGet(proj,0,0);
00041    (*It)->projy=cvmGet(proj,0,1);
00042    float s_th=sin((*It)->theta);
00043    float c_th=cos((*It)->theta);
00044    float s_ph=sin((*It)->phi);
00045    float c_ph=cos((*It)->phi);
00047    cvmSet((*It)->dpdw,0,3,cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,0,0)*(-s_th*s_ph)/(*It)->rho+
00048                           cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,0,1)*(-c_th     )/(*It)->rho+
00049                           cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,0,2)*(-s_th*c_ph)/(*It)->rho);
00052    cvmSet((*It)->dpdw,0,4,cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,0,0)*(c_th*c_ph)/(*It)->rho+
00053                           cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,0,1)*(0.0    )/(*It)->rho+
00054                           cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,0,2)*(-c_th*s_ph)/(*It)->rho);
00055 
00059    cvmSet((*It)->dpdw,0,5,cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,0,0)*(-c_th*s_ph)/((*It)->rho*(*It)->rho)+
00060                           cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,0,1)*(s_th     )/((*It)->rho*(*It)->rho)+
00061                           cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,0,2)*(-c_th*c_ph)/((*It)->rho*(*It)->rho));
00062 
00064     cvmSet((*It)->dpdw,1,3,cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,1,0)*(-s_th*s_ph)/(*It)->rho+
00065                            cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,1,1)*(-c_th     )/(*It)->rho+
00066                            cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,1,2)*(-s_th*c_ph)/(*It)->rho);
00067 
00070      cvmSet((*It)->dpdw,1,4,cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,1,0)*(c_th*c_ph)/(*It)->rho+
00071                             cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,1,1)*(0.0    )/(*It)->rho+
00072                             cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,1,2)*(-c_th*s_ph)/(*It)->rho);
00073 
00077      cvmSet((*It)->dpdw,1,5,cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,1,0)*(-c_th*s_ph)/((*It)->rho*(*It)->rho)+
00078                             cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,1,1)*(s_th     )/((*It)->rho*(*It)->rho)+
00079                             cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,1,2)*(-c_th*c_ph)/((*It)->rho*(*It)->rho));
00080 
00081 }
00082 cvReleaseMat(&obj);
00083 cvReleaseMat(&proj);
00084 }

00094 void CModelCam::cvProject_1_pto(CvMat* nobj, CvMat* nimg,
00095                         CvMat* dpdr, CvMat* dpdt, CvMat* dpdw)
00096 {
00097    CvMat* dpdr_;
00098    CvMat* dpdt_;
00099    CvMat* dpdf;
00100    CvMat* dpdc;
00101    CvMat* dpdk;
00102    CvMat* dpdw_;
00103 //Esto se hace así porque sino no puede detectar si la matriz es vertical u hor.
00104    dpdf= cvCreateMat(2*4,2,CV_32FC1);
00105    dpdc= cvCreateMat(2*4,2,CV_32FC1);
00106    dpdk= cvCreateMat(2*4,4,CV_32FC1);
00107    dpdr_= cvCreateMat(2*4,3,CV_32FC1);
00108    dpdt_= cvCreateMat(2*4,3,CV_32FC1);
00109    dpdw_= cvCreateMat(2*4,3*4,CV_32FC1);
00110 
00111    CvMat * m;
00112    m=cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
00113    CvMat *obj;
00114    obj=cvCreateMat(4,3,CV_32FC1);
00115    cvmSet(m,0,0,cos(cvmGet(nobj,0,3))*sin(cvmGet(nobj,0,4)));//(*It)->theta)*sin((*It)->phi));
00116    cvmSet(m,1,0,-sin(cvmGet(nobj,0,3)));//(*It)->theta));
00117    cvmSet(m,2,0,cos(cvmGet(nobj,0,3))*cos(cvmGet(nobj,0,4)));//cos((*It)->theta)*cos((*It)->phi));
00118    cvNormalize( m, m);
00119    cvmSet(obj,0,0,cvmGet(nobj,0,0) +cvmGet(m,0,0)/cvmGet(nobj,0,5));
00120    cvmSet(obj,0,1,cvmGet(nobj,0,1) +cvmGet(m,1,0)/cvmGet(nobj,0,5));
00121    cvmSet(obj,0,2,cvmGet(nobj,0,2) +cvmGet(m,2,0)/cvmGet(nobj,0,5));
00122 
00123    cvProjectPoints3(obj,pDataCam->rotation,pDataCam->translation,pDataCam->calibration,
00124                         pDataCam->distortion, nimg,dpdr_, dpdt_, dpdf, dpdc, dpdk , dpdw_);
00125 if (dpdr!=NULL){
00126    cvmSet(dpdr,0,0,cvmGet(dpdr_,0,0));
00127    cvmSet(dpdr,0,1,cvmGet(dpdr_,0,1));
00128    cvmSet(dpdr,0,2,cvmGet(dpdr_,0,2));
00129    cvmSet(dpdr,1,0,cvmGet(dpdr_,1,0));
00130    cvmSet(dpdr,1,1,cvmGet(dpdr_,1,1));
00131    cvmSet(dpdr,1,2,cvmGet(dpdr_,1,2));
00132 }
00133 if (dpdt!=NULL){
00134    cvmSet(dpdt,0,0,cvmGet(dpdt_,0,0));
00135    cvmSet(dpdt,0,1,cvmGet(dpdt_,0,1));
00136    cvmSet(dpdt,0,2,cvmGet(dpdt_,0,2));
00137    cvmSet(dpdt,1,0,cvmGet(dpdt_,1,0));
00138    cvmSet(dpdt,1,1,cvmGet(dpdt_,1,1));
00139    cvmSet(dpdt,1,2,cvmGet(dpdt_,1,2));
00140 }
00141 if (dpdw!=NULL){
00142    cvmSet(dpdw,0,0,cvmGet(dpdw_,0,0));
00143    cvmSet(dpdw,0,1,cvmGet(dpdw_,0,1));
00144    cvmSet(dpdw,0,2,cvmGet(dpdw_,0,2));
00145    cvmSet(dpdw,0,3,cvmGet(dpdw_,0,0));
00146    cvmSet(dpdw,0,4,cvmGet(dpdw_,0,1));
00147    cvmSet(dpdw,0,5,cvmGet(dpdw_,0,2));
00148 
00149    cvmSet(dpdw,1,0,cvmGet(dpdw_,1,0));
00150    cvmSet(dpdw,1,1,cvmGet(dpdw_,1,1));
00151    cvmSet(dpdw,1,2,cvmGet(dpdw_,1,2));
00152    cvmSet(dpdw,1,3,cvmGet(dpdw_,1,0));
00153    cvmSet(dpdw,1,4,cvmGet(dpdw_,1,1));
00154    cvmSet(dpdw,1,5,cvmGet(dpdw_,1,2));
00155 }
00156 
00157 cvReleaseMat (&dpdf);
00158 cvReleaseMat (&dpdc);
00159 cvReleaseMat (&dpdk);
00160 cvReleaseMat (&dpdr_);
00161 cvReleaseMat (&dpdt_);
00162 cvReleaseMat (&dpdw_);
00163 cvReleaseMat (&obj);
00164 cvReleaseMat (&m);
00165 }

00177 void CModelCam::cvInverseParam(CvMat** h,CvPoint pto)
00178 {
00179      CvMat *pixel;
00180      pixel=cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
00181      cvmSet(pixel,0,0,pto.x);
00182      cvmSet(pixel,1,0,pto.y);
00183      cvmSet(pixel,2,0,1);
00184      CvMat *inv;
00185      inv=cvCreateMat(3,3,CV_32FC1);
00186      cvInvert(pDataCam->calibration,inv,CV_SVD);
00187 
00188      CvMat *temp1;
00189      temp1=cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
00190      cvGEMM(inv,pixel,1,NULL,0,temp1);//CUIDADO ESTA A 0 TRANSLATION
00191 
00192      cvInvert(pDataCam->rotMat,inv);
00193      cvGEMM(inv,temp1,1,NULL,0,*h);
00194 
00195         cvReleaseMat(&pixel);
00196         cvReleaseMat(&inv);
00197         cvReleaseMat(&temp1);
00198 }
00202 void CModelCam::cvProjectPoints3( const CvMat* obj_points,
00203                         const CvMat* r_vec,
00204                         const CvMat* t_vec,
00205                         const CvMat* A,
00206                         const CvMat* dist_coeffs,
00207                         CvMat* img_points, CvMat* dpdr,
00208                         CvMat* dpdt, CvMat* dpdf,
00209                         CvMat* dpdc, CvMat* dpdk ,CvMat* dpdw)
00210 {
00211    CvMat *_M = 0, *_m = 0;
00212    CvMat *_dpdr = 0, *_dpdt = 0, *_dpdc = 0, *_dpdf = 0, *_dpdk = 0,*_dpdw=0;
00213 
00214    CV_FUNCNAME( "cvProjectPoints3" );
00215 
00216    __BEGIN__;
00217 
00218    int i, j, count;
00219    int l=-1;
00220    int calc_derivatives;
00221    const CvPoint3D64f* M;
00222    CvPoint2D64f* m;
00223    double r[3], R[9], dRdr[27], t[3], a[9], k[4] = {0,0,0,0}, fx, fy, cx, cy;
00224    CvMat _r, _t, _a = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64F, a ), _k;
00225    CvMat _R = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64F, R ), _dRdr = cvMat( 3, 9, CV_64F, dRdr );
00226    double *dpdr_p = 0,*dpdw_p = 0, *dpdt_p = 0, *dpdk_p = 0, *dpdf_p = 0, *dpdc_p = 0;
00227    int dpdr_step = 0, dpdt_step = 0, dpdk_step = 0, dpdf_step = 0, dpdc_step = 0,dpdw_step=0;
00228 
00229    if( !CV_IS_MAT(obj_points) || !CV_IS_MAT(r_vec) ||
00230         !CV_IS_MAT(t_vec) || !CV_IS_MAT(A) ||
00231         /* CV_IS_MAT(dist_coeffs) ||*/ !CV_IS_MAT(img_points) )
00232       CV_ERROR( CV_StsBadArg, "One of required arguments is not a valid matrix" );
00233 
00234    count = MAX(obj_points->rows, obj_points->cols);
00235 //   count = 1; //cuidado se ha cambiado para solo aceptar un puntos
00236    if( CV_IS_CONT_MAT(obj_points->type) && CV_MAT_DEPTH(obj_points->type) == CV_64F &&
00237        (obj_points->rows == 1 && CV_MAT_CN(obj_points->type) == 3 ||
00238        obj_points->rows == count && CV_MAT_CN(obj_points->type)*obj_points->cols == 3))
00239       _M = (CvMat*)obj_points;
00240    else
00241    {
00242       CV_CALL( _M = cvCreateMat( 1, count, CV_64FC3 ));
00243       CV_CALL( cvConvertPointsHomogenious( obj_points, _M ));
00244    }
00245 
00246    if( CV_IS_CONT_MAT(img_points->type) && CV_MAT_DEPTH(img_points->type) == CV_64F &&
00247        (img_points->rows == 1 && CV_MAT_CN(img_points->type) == 2 ||
00248        img_points->rows == count && CV_MAT_CN(img_points->type)*img_points->cols == 2))
00249       _m = img_points;
00250    else
00251       CV_CALL( _m = cvCreateMat( 1, count, CV_64FC2 ));
00252 
00253    M = (CvPoint3D64f*)_M->data.db;
00254    m = (CvPoint2D64f*)_m->data.db;
00255 
00256    if( CV_MAT_DEPTH(r_vec->type) != CV_64F && CV_MAT_DEPTH(r_vec->type) != CV_32F ||
00257        (r_vec->rows != 1 && r_vec->cols != 1 ||
00258        r_vec->rows*r_vec->cols*CV_MAT_CN(r_vec->type) != 3) &&
00259        (r_vec->rows != 3 && r_vec->cols != 3 || CV_MAT_CN(r_vec->type) != 1))
00260       CV_ERROR( CV_StsBadArg, "Rotation must be represented by 1x3 or 3x1 "
00261             "floating-point rotation vector, or 3x3 rotation matrix" );
00262 
00263    if( r_vec->rows == 3 && r_vec->cols == 3 )
00264    {
00265       _r = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, r );
00266       CV_CALL( cvRodrigues2( r_vec, &_r ));
00267       CV_CALL( cvRodrigues2( &_r, &_R, &_dRdr ));
00268       cvCopy( r_vec, &_R );
00269    }
00270    else
00271    {
00272       _r = cvMat( r_vec->rows, r_vec->cols, CV_MAKETYPE(CV_64F,CV_MAT_CN(r_vec->type)), r );
00273       CV_CALL( cvConvert( r_vec, &_r ));
00274       CV_CALL( cvRodrigues2( &_r, &_R, &_dRdr ) );
00275   }
00276 
00277    if( CV_MAT_DEPTH(t_vec->type) != CV_64F && CV_MAT_DEPTH(t_vec->type) != CV_32F ||
00278        t_vec->rows != 1 && t_vec->cols != 1 ||
00279        t_vec->rows*t_vec->cols*CV_MAT_CN(t_vec->type) != 3 )
00280       CV_ERROR( CV_StsBadArg,
00281                 "Translation vector must be 1x3 or 3x1 floating-point vector" );
00282 
00283    _t = cvMat( t_vec->rows, t_vec->cols, CV_MAKETYPE(CV_64F,CV_MAT_CN(t_vec->type)), t );
00284    CV_CALL( cvConvert( t_vec, &_t ));
00285 
00286    if( CV_MAT_TYPE(A->type) != CV_64FC1 && CV_MAT_TYPE(A->type) != CV_32FC1 ||
00287        A->rows != 3 || A->cols != 3 )
00288       CV_ERROR( CV_StsBadArg, "Instrinsic parameters must be 3x3 floating-point matrix" );
00289 
00290    CV_CALL( cvConvert( A, &_a ));
00291    fx = a[0]; fy = a[4];
00292    cx = a[2]; cy = a[5];
00293 
00294    if( dist_coeffs )
00295    {
00296       if( !CV_IS_MAT(dist_coeffs) ||
00297            CV_MAT_DEPTH(dist_coeffs->type) != CV_64F &&
00298            CV_MAT_DEPTH(dist_coeffs->type) != CV_32F ||
00299            dist_coeffs->rows != 1 && dist_coeffs->cols != 1 ||
00300            dist_coeffs->rows*dist_coeffs->cols*CV_MAT_CN(dist_coeffs->type) != 4 )
00301          CV_ERROR( CV_StsBadArg,
00302                    "Distortion coefficients must be 1x4 or 4x1 floating-point vector" );
00303 
00304       _k = cvMat( dist_coeffs->rows, dist_coeffs->cols,
00305                   CV_MAKETYPE(CV_64F,CV_MAT_CN(dist_coeffs->type)), k );
00306       CV_CALL( cvConvert( dist_coeffs, &_k ));
00307    }
00308 
00309    if( dpdr )
00310    {
00311       if( !CV_IS_MAT(dpdr) ||
00312            CV_MAT_TYPE(dpdr->type) != CV_32FC1 &&
00313            CV_MAT_TYPE(dpdr->type) != CV_64FC1 ||
00314            dpdr->rows != count*2 || dpdr->cols != 3 )
00315         {
00316          printf("dpdr rows: %d count*2:%d dpdr->cols: %d \n",dpdr->rows,count*2,dpdr->cols);
00317          CV_ERROR( CV_StsBadArg, "dp/drot must be 2Nx3 floating-point matrix" );
00318         }
00319 
00320       if( CV_MAT_TYPE(dpdr->type) == CV_64FC1 )
00321          _dpdr = dpdr;
00322       else
00323          CV_CALL( _dpdr = cvCreateMat( 2*count, 3, CV_64FC1 ));
00324       dpdr_p = _dpdr->data.db;
00325       dpdr_step = _dpdr->step/sizeof(dpdr_p[0]);
00326    }
00327 
00328    if( dpdw )
00329    {
00330       if( !CV_IS_MAT(dpdw) ||
00331            CV_MAT_TYPE(dpdw->type) != CV_32FC1 &&
00332            CV_MAT_TYPE(dpdw->type) != CV_64FC1 ||
00333            dpdw->rows != count*2 || dpdw->cols != 3*count )
00334          CV_ERROR( CV_StsBadArg, "dp/dw must be 2Nx3*N floating-point matrix" );
00335 
00336       if( CV_MAT_TYPE(dpdw->type) == CV_64FC1 )
00337          _dpdw = dpdw;
00338       else
00339          CV_CALL( _dpdw = cvCreateMat( 2*count, 3*count, CV_64FC1 ));
00340       cvSetIdentity(_dpdw,cvScalar(0.0));
00341       dpdw_p = _dpdw->data.db;
00342       dpdw_step = _dpdw->step/sizeof(dpdw_p[0]);
00343    }
00344 
00345    if( dpdt )
00346    {
00347       if( !CV_IS_MAT(dpdt) ||
00348            CV_MAT_TYPE(dpdt->type) != CV_32FC1 &&
00349            CV_MAT_TYPE(dpdt->type) != CV_64FC1 ||
00350            dpdt->rows != count*2 || dpdt->cols != 3 )
00351          CV_ERROR( CV_StsBadArg, "dp/dT must be 2Nx3 floating-point matrix" );
00352 
00353       if( CV_MAT_TYPE(dpdt->type) == CV_64FC1 )
00354          _dpdt = dpdt;
00355       else
00356          CV_CALL( _dpdt = cvCreateMat( 2*count, 3, CV_64FC1 ));
00357       dpdt_p = _dpdt->data.db;
00358       dpdt_step = _dpdt->step/sizeof(dpdt_p[0]);
00359    }
00360 
00361    if( dpdf )
00362    {
00363       if( !CV_IS_MAT(dpdf) ||
00364            CV_MAT_TYPE(dpdf->type) != CV_32FC1 && CV_MAT_TYPE(dpdf->type) != CV_64FC1 ||
00365            dpdf->rows != count*2 || dpdf->cols != 2 )
00366          CV_ERROR( CV_StsBadArg, "dp/df must be 2Nx2 floating-point matrix" );
00367 
00368       if( CV_MAT_TYPE(dpdf->type) == CV_64FC1 )
00369          _dpdf = dpdf;
00370       else
00371          CV_CALL( _dpdf = cvCreateMat( 2*count, 2, CV_64FC1 ));
00372       dpdf_p = _dpdf->data.db;
00373       dpdf_step = _dpdf->step/sizeof(dpdf_p[0]);
00374    }
00375 
00376    if( dpdc )
00377    {
00378       if( !CV_IS_MAT(dpdc) ||
00379            CV_MAT_TYPE(dpdc->type) != CV_32FC1 && CV_MAT_TYPE(dpdc->type) != CV_64FC1 ||
00380            dpdc->rows != count*2 || dpdc->cols != 2 )
00381          CV_ERROR( CV_StsBadArg, "dp/dc must be 2Nx2 floating-point matrix" );
00382 
00383       if( CV_MAT_TYPE(dpdc->type) == CV_64FC1 )
00384          _dpdc = dpdc;
00385       else
00386          CV_CALL( _dpdc = cvCreateMat( 2*count, 2, CV_64FC1 ));
00387       dpdc_p = _dpdc->data.db;
00388       dpdc_step = _dpdc->step/sizeof(dpdc_p[0]);
00389    }
00390 
00391    if( dpdk )
00392    {
00393       if( !CV_IS_MAT(dpdk) ||
00394            CV_MAT_TYPE(dpdk->type) != CV_32FC1 && CV_MAT_TYPE(dpdk->type) != CV_64FC1 ||
00395            dpdk->rows != count*2 || (dpdk->cols != 4 && dpdk->cols != 2) )
00396          CV_ERROR( CV_StsBadArg, "dp/df must be 2Nx4 or 2Nx2 floating-point matrix" );
00397 
00398       if( !dist_coeffs )
00399          CV_ERROR( CV_StsNullPtr, "dist_coeffs is NULL while dpdk is not" );
00400 
00401       if( CV_MAT_TYPE(dpdk->type) == CV_64FC1 )
00402          _dpdk = dpdk;
00403       else
00404          CV_CALL( _dpdk = cvCreateMat( dpdk->rows, dpdk->cols, CV_64FC1 ));
00405       dpdk_p = _dpdk->data.db;
00406       dpdk_step = _dpdk->step/sizeof(dpdk_p[0]);
00407    }
00408 
00409    calc_derivatives = dpdr || dpdt || dpdf || dpdc || dpdk;
00410 
00411    for( i = 0; i < count; i++ )
00412    {
00413       double X = M[i].x-t[0], Y = M[i].y-t[1], Z = M[i].z-t[2];
00414       double xp = R[0]*X + R[1]*Y + R[2]*Z ;
00415       double yp = R[3]*X + R[4]*Y + R[5]*Z ;
00416       double zp = R[6]*X + R[7]*Y + R[8]*Z ;
00417       double r2, r4, a1, a2, a3, cdist;
00418       double xd, yd;
00419       double x,y,z;
00420       z = zp ? 1./zp : 1;
00421       x =xp* z; y =yp* z;
00422 
00423       r2 = x*x + y*y;
00424       r4 = r2*r2;
00425       a1 = 2*x*y;
00426       a2 = r2 + 2*x*x;
00427       a3 = r2 + 2*y*y;
00428       cdist = 1 + k[0]*r2 + k[1]*r4;
00429       xd = x*cdist + k[2]*a1 + k[3]*a2;
00430       yd = y*cdist + k[2]*a3 + k[3]*a1;
00431 
00432       m[i].x = xd*fx + cx;
00433       m[i].y = yd*fy + cy;
00434 
00435       if( calc_derivatives )
00436       {
00437          if( dpdc_p )
00438          {
00439             dpdc_p[0] = 1; dpdc_p[1] = 0;
00440             dpdc_p[dpdc_step] = 0;
00441             dpdc_p[dpdc_step+1] = 1;
00442             dpdc_p += dpdc_step*2;
00443          }
00444 
00445          if( dpdf_p )
00446          {
00447             dpdf_p[0] = xd; dpdf_p[1] = 0;
00448             dpdf_p[dpdf_step] = 0;
00449             dpdf_p[dpdf_step+1] = yd;
00450             dpdf_p += dpdf_step*2;
00451          }
00452 
00453          if( dpdk_p )
00454          {
00455             dpdk_p[0] = fx*x*r2;
00456             dpdk_p[1] = fx*x*r4;
00457             dpdk_p[dpdk_step] = fy*y*r2;
00458             dpdk_p[dpdk_step+1] = fy*y*r4;
00459             if( _dpdk->cols > 2 )
00460             {
00461                dpdk_p[2] = fx*a1;
00462                dpdk_p[3] = fx*a2;
00463                dpdk_p[dpdk_step+2] = fy*a3;
00464                dpdk_p[dpdk_step+3] = fy*a1;
00465             }
00466             dpdk_p += dpdk_step*2;
00467          }
00468 
00469          if( dpdt_p )
00470          {
00471             double dxdp[] = { z, 0, -x*z };
00472             double dydp[] = { 0, z, -y*z };
00473             double dydt[3], dxdt[3];
00474 
00475             dxdt[0]=-R[0]*dxdp[0]-R[3]*dxdp[1]-R[6]*dxdp[2];
00476             dxdt[1]=-R[1]*dxdp[0]-R[4]*dxdp[1]-R[7]*dxdp[2];
00477             dxdt[2]=-R[2]*dxdp[0]-R[5]*dxdp[1]-R[8]*dxdp[2];
00478 
00479             dydt[0]=-R[0]*dydp[0]-R[3]*dydp[1]-R[6]*dydp[2];
00480             dydt[1]=-R[1]*dydp[0]-R[4]*dydp[1]-R[7]*dydp[2];
00481             dydt[2]=-R[2]*dydp[0]-R[5]*dydp[1]-R[8]*dydp[2];
00482 
00483             for( j = 0; j < 3; j++ )
00484             {
00485                double dr2dt = 2*x*dxdt[j] + 2*y*dydt[j];
00486                double dcdist_dt = k[0]*dr2dt + 2*k[1]*r2*dr2dt;
00487                double da1dt = 2*(x*dydt[j] + y*dxdt[j]);
00488                double dmxdt = fx*(dxdt[j]*cdist + x*dcdist_dt +
00489                         k[2]*da1dt + k[3]*(dr2dt + 2*x*dxdt[j]));
00490                double dmydt = fy*(dydt[j]*cdist + y*dcdist_dt +
00491                         k[2]*(dr2dt + 2*y*dydt[j]) + k[3]*da1dt);
00492                dpdt_p[j] = dmxdt;
00493                dpdt_p[dpdt_step+j] = dmydt;
00494 
00495             }
00496 
00497             dpdt_p += dpdt_step*2;
00498          }
00499 
00500          if( dpdw_p )
00501          {
00502             double dwdW[6];
00503 
00504             l+=1;
00505             double dxdp[] = { z, 0, -x*z };
00506             double dydp[] = { 0, z, -y*z };
00507 
00508             dwdW[0]=R[0]*dxdp[0]+R[3]*dxdp[1]+R[6]*dxdp[2];
00509             dwdW[1]=R[1]*dxdp[0]+R[4]*dxdp[1]+R[7]*dxdp[2];
00510             dwdW[2]=R[2]*dxdp[0]+R[5]*dxdp[1]+R[8]*dxdp[2];
00511 
00512             dwdW[3]=R[0]*dydp[0]+R[3]*dydp[1]+R[6]*dydp[2];
00513             dwdW[4]=R[1]*dydp[0]+R[4]*dydp[1]+R[7]*dydp[2];
00514             dwdW[5]=R[2]*dydp[0]+R[5]*dydp[1]+R[8]*dydp[2];
00515 
00516 
00517             for( j = 0; j < 3; j++ )
00518             {
00519             double dr2dt = 2*x*dwdW[j] + 2*y*dwdW[j+3];
00520             double dcdist_dt = k[0]*dr2dt + 2*k[1]*r2*dr2dt;
00521             double da1dt = 2*(x*dwdW[j+3] + y*dwdW[j]);
00522             double dmxdt = fx*(dwdW[j]*cdist + x*dcdist_dt +
00523                      k[2]*da1dt + k[3]*(dr2dt + 4*x*dwdW[j]));
00524             double dmydt = fy*(dwdW[j+3]*cdist + y*dcdist_dt +
00525                      k[2]*(dr2dt + 4*y*dwdW[j+3]) + k[3]*da1dt);
00526 
00527             cvmSet(_dpdw,l*2,j,dmxdt);
00528             cvmSet(_dpdw,l*2+1,j,dmydt);
00529             }
00530 
00531          }
00532          if( dpdr_p )
00533          {
00534             double dx0dr[] =
00535             {
00536                X*dRdr[0] + Y*dRdr[1] + Z*dRdr[2],
00537                X*dRdr[9] + Y*dRdr[10] + Z*dRdr[11],
00538                X*dRdr[18] + Y*dRdr[19] + Z*dRdr[20]
00539             };
00540             double dy0dr[] =
00541             {
00542                X*dRdr[3] + Y*dRdr[4] + Z*dRdr[5],
00543                X*dRdr[12] + Y*dRdr[13] + Z*dRdr[14],
00544                X*dRdr[21] + Y*dRdr[22] + Z*dRdr[23]
00545             };
00546             double dz0dr[] =
00547             {
00548                X*dRdr[6] + Y*dRdr[7] + Z*dRdr[8],
00549                X*dRdr[15] + Y*dRdr[16] + Z*dRdr[17],
00550                X*dRdr[24] + Y*dRdr[25] + Z*dRdr[26]
00551             };
00552             for( j = 0; j < 3; j++ )
00553             {
00554                double dxdr = z*(dx0dr[j] - x*dz0dr[j]);
00555                double dydr = z*(dy0dr[j] - y*dz0dr[j]);
00556                double dr2dr = 2*x*dxdr + 2*y*dydr;
00557                double dcdist_dr = k[0]*dr2dr + 2*k[1]*r2*dr2dr;
00558                double da1dr = 2*(x*dydr + y*dxdr);
00559                double dmxdr = fx*(dxdr*cdist + x*dcdist_dr +
00560                         k[2]*da1dr + k[3]*(dr2dr + 2*x*dxdr));
00561                double dmydr = fy*(dydr*cdist + y*dcdist_dr +
00562                         k[2]*(dr2dr + 2*y*dydr) + k[3]*da1dr);
00563                dpdr_p[j] = dmxdr;
00564                dpdr_p[dpdr_step+j] = dmydr;
00565             }
00566             dpdr_p += dpdr_step*2;
00567          }
00568       }
00569    }
00570 
00571    if( _m != img_points )
00572       cvConvertPointsHomogenious( _m, img_points );
00573    if( _dpdr != dpdr )
00574       cvConvert( _dpdr, dpdr );
00575    if( _dpdt != dpdt )
00576       cvConvert( _dpdt, dpdt );
00577    if( _dpdf != dpdf )
00578       cvConvert( _dpdf, dpdf );
00579    if( _dpdc != dpdc )
00580       cvConvert( _dpdc, dpdc );
00581    if( _dpdk != dpdk )
00582       cvConvert( _dpdk, dpdk );
00583    if( _dpdw != dpdw )
00584       cvConvert( _dpdw, dpdw );
00585 
00586    __END__;
00587 
00588    if( _M != obj_points )
00589       cvReleaseMat( &_M );
00590    if( _m != img_points )
00591       cvReleaseMat( &_m );
00592    if( _dpdr != dpdr )
00593       cvReleaseMat( &_dpdr );
00594    if( _dpdt != dpdt )
00595       cvReleaseMat( &_dpdt );
00596    if( _dpdf != dpdf )
00597       cvReleaseMat( &_dpdf );
00598    if( _dpdc != dpdc )
00599       cvReleaseMat( &_dpdc );
00600    if( _dpdk != dpdk )
00601       cvReleaseMat( &_dpdk );
00602    if( _dpdw != dpdw )
00603       cvReleaseMat( &_dpdw );
00604 }
00609 void CModelCam::getJInit(CvMat *Jpos, CvMat *Jpix, CvPoint pto)
00610 {
00611      CvPoint2D32f fpto;
00612      fpto.x=pto.x;
00613      fpto.y=pto.y;
00614      CvMat *pixel;
00615      float diff=0.01;
00616      pixel=cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
00617      CvMat *h;
00618      h=cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
00619      double wx,wy,wz,theta,phi;
00620      cvmSet(pixel,0,0,fpto.x);
00621      cvmSet(pixel,1,0,fpto.y);
00622      cvmSet(pixel,2,0,1);
00623      CvMat *inv;
00624      inv=cvCreateMat(3,3,CV_32FC1);
00625      cvInvert(pDataCam->calibration,inv,CV_SVD);
00626 
00627      CvMat *temp1;
00628      temp1=cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
00629      cvGEMM(inv,pixel,1,pDataCam->translation,-1,temp1);
00630 
00631      cvInvert(pDataCam->rotMat,inv);
00632 
00633      cvGEMM(inv,temp1,1,NULL,0,h);
00634 
00635          // pModelCam->cvInverseParam(&h,(*It)->pto);
00636          wx=cvmGet(pDataCam->translation,0,0);
00637          wy=cvmGet(pDataCam->translation,1,0);
00638          wz=cvmGet(pDataCam->translation,2,0);
00639          theta=atan2(-cvmGet(h,1,0),sqrt(cvmGet(h,0,0)*cvmGet(h,0,0)+cvmGet(h,2,0)*cvmGet(h,2,0)));
00640      phi=atan2(cvmGet(h,0,0),cvmGet(h,2,0));
00641      //(*It)->rho=1./200000.;
00642 
00643      fpto.x+=diff;
00644      cvmSet(pixel,0,0,fpto.x);
00645      cvmSet(pixel,1,0,fpto.y);
00646      cvmSet(pixel,2,0,1);
00647      cvInvert(pDataCam->calibration,inv,CV_SVD);
00648      cvGEMM(inv,pixel,1,pDataCam->translation,-1,temp1);
00649      cvInvert(pDataCam->rotMat,inv);
00650      cvGEMM(inv,temp1,1,NULL,0,h);
00651          // pModelCam->cvInverseParam(&h,(*It)->pto);
00652          cvmSet(Jpix,0,0,(wx-cvmGet(pDataCam->translation,0,0))/diff);
00653          cvmSet(Jpix,1,0,(wy-cvmGet(pDataCam->translation,1,0))/diff);
00654          cvmSet(Jpix,2,0,(wz-cvmGet(pDataCam->translation,2,0))/diff);
00655          cvmSet(Jpix,3,0,(theta-atan2(-cvmGet(h,1,0),sqrt(cvmGet(h,0,0)*cvmGet(h,0,0)+cvmGet(h,2,0)*cvmGet(h,2,0))))/diff);
00656      cvmSet(Jpix,4,0,(phi-atan2(cvmGet(h,0,0),cvmGet(h,2,0)))/diff);
00657      cvmSet(Jpix,5,0,0);//(*It)->rho=1./200000.;
00658      fpto.x-=diff;
00659 
00660      fpto.y+=diff;
00661      cvmSet(pixel,0,0,fpto.x);
00662      cvmSet(pixel,1,0,fpto.y);
00663      cvmSet(pixel,2,0,1);
00664      cvInvert(pDataCam->calibration,inv,CV_SVD);

00666      cvInvert(pDataCam->rotMat,inv);
00667      cvGEMM(inv,temp1,1,NULL,0,h);

00673      cvmSet(Jpix,4,1,(phi-atan2(cvmGet(h,0,0),cvmGet(h,2,0)))/diff);

00675      fpto.y-=diff;
